page.title: 05Fenton area Health Care
page.content: Looking after ones health can be difficult in these rural areas. The nearest group practice is in Saxilby which has five doctors and its own dispensary.There is also a Doctor who has a surgery in Marton. The Doctors will visit in urgent cases, but for those people without transport, getting to the surgery can be a problem. There is a small hospital in Gainsborough and the County hospital is in Lincoln. The nearest dentist is in Gainsborough but there is an Optician in Saxilby. The majority of families are very happy living in the country, although a number of older residents regret the high cost and infrequency of public transport. Both primary and secondary school age children are taken to their schools on buses provided by Lincolnshire County Council.
